nodes.text: Poronth Ghon was a male Lethan Twi'lek Pilgrim who lived on Tython illegally during the Cold War between the resurgent Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic.

A Twi'lek male, Poronth Ghon was the father of Tazonthe Ghon. He, along with his son, was one of many Pilgrims who followed Matriarch Kolovish to the planet Tython in the aftermath of the Great Galactic War and the enslavement of Ryloth by the Hutt Cartel. While assisting in the establishment of Kalikori village, Ghon was killed and eaten by a band of Flesh Raiders in the Tythos Ridge.
